caption: Unidades
query: select units.id, units.name, name_id, device_id, vehicle_id, units.person_id, icon_id, coalesce(c.id, '') as client_id, account_id, contract_start, contract_end, status_id FROM units LEFT JOIN accounts as a ON a.id = account_id LEFT JOIN clients as c ON c.id = a.client_id
query2: SELECT units.id, units.name, name_id, device_id, vehicle_id, units.person_id, icon_id, ifnull(c.id, '') as client_id, account_id, contract_start, contract_end, status_id FROM units LEFT JOIN accounts as a ON a.id = account_id LEFT JOIN clients as c ON c.id = a.client_id LIMIT 10

infoFields.name: name_id
infoFields.caption: ID Unidad
data: select id, name from units_names ORDER BY 2

infoFields.name: device_id
infoFields.caption: Equipo
data: select id, device_name as x from devices WHERE device_name IS NOT NULL ORDER BY 2

infoFields.name: vehicle_id
infoFields.caption: Vehículo
data: SELECT id, plate FROM vehicles ORDER BY 2

infoFields.name: icon_id
infoFields.caption: Ícono
data: SELECT id, icon FROM icons WHERE type_id = 1 ORDER BY 2

infoFields.name: client_id
infoFields.caption: Client
data: select id, client from clients ORDER BY 2

infoFields.name: account_id
infoFields.caption: Cuenta
data: select id, name, client_id from accounts ORDER BY 2
